t: Hugo Boss - Wikipedia
s: 4 days ago - Hugo Boss AG (stylized as HUGO BOSS) is a designer fashion company headquartered in Metzingen, Baden-Württemberg, Germany. The company sells clothing, accessories, footwear, and leather goods. Hugo Boss is one of the largest German clothing brands, with global sales of about €4.3 billion in 2024.
